abstract: United States stocks close largely higher due to gains in energy, financial and mining companies.
lead_paragraph: Netflix stock slumped more than 11 percent a day after the company’s latest forecast for streaming video subscribers disappointed investors.

headline.main: Wall St. Is Mostly Higher, Helped by Oil Prices
headline.print_headline: Markets Edge Higher on Strength of Earnings and Oil

snippet: Netflix stock slumped more than 11 percent a day after the company’s latest forecast for streaming video subscribers disappointed investors.
